questions.question: Write the number to which 8 has the greater value: 0.082 or 0.28.

questions.description: Identify the digit in the hundred thousand place.

questions.description: Identify the number category that includes whole numbers and their opposites.

questions.description: Arrange the given numbers in ascending order.

questions.description: Calculate the ratio of boys to girls.

questions.description: Identify the only even prime number.

questions.question: Identify the base for the number 7.
questions.description: Identify the base of the number.

questions.description: Compare two decimal numbers to find the greater one.
